<dl>
<dt>*Degrading resolution*</dt>
<dd>The mechanism of taking Data captured to a very high resolution and making it appropriate to use at a lower resolution.  This may be for technical performance reasons for visualisation for example, or to take finely detailed information (e.g. the distribution of a species over a city) and derive that if it exists in the city, it also exists in the country to which that city belongs</dd>
